info.name: Streaming Spectrogram v.2 - old
info.description:
Now sound is rendered in another buffer which is sampled by the spectrogram, thus eliminating redundant mainSound calculations.
Revision of [url]https://www.shadertoy.com/view/lsSfDD[/url]

// Passthrough to Buf A

void mainImage( out vec4 f, in vec2 d ) { f = texelFetch(iChannel0, ivec2(d), 0); }
